about_the_game:
Six months have passed after Farren and Boji’s last adventure in Stray Blade.

Join both in the next chapter and protect Acrea from a new enemy which threatens to take over the long-forgotten land.

Key Features
  • A new journey: Learn more about what has become of Farren and Boji in the time that has passed.
  • Return to the Wastelands: Experience the return to the Seething Wastelands in a new way.
  • Prepare: Discover new and powerful armor (helmet, shoulder pads and chest plate), all infused with the Acrean elements, granting extraordinary strong protection and energy efficiency.
  • New Enemies: Encounter humanoid enemies which deserted from their factions as well as tamed creatures which now fight alongside the humans.
  • The Final Boss: Prove yourself once again in one new epic boss fight against Knox, a former member of the Golden Order.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood from killing creatures or enemies and player deaths including impalement.

detailed_description:
Six months have passed after Farren and Boji’s last adventure in Stray Blade.

Join both in the next chapter and protect Acrea from a new enemy which threatens to take over the long-forgotten land.

Key Features
  • A new journey: Learn more about what has become of Farren and Boji in the time that has passed.
  • Return to the Wastelands: Experience the return to the Seething Wastelands in a new way.
  • Prepare: Discover new and powerful armor (helmet, shoulder pads and chest plate), all infused with the Acrean elements, granting extraordinary strong protection and energy efficiency.
  • New Enemies: Encounter humanoid enemies which deserted from their factions as well as tamed creatures which now fight alongside the humans.
  • The Final Boss: Prove yourself once again in one new epic boss fight against Knox, a former member of the Golden Order.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-9590 (8 * 4700) or equivalent or Intel Core i7-6700 (4 * 3400)
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 480 (8192 MB) or GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4096 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X (6 * 3700) or equivalent or Intel Core i9-9900k (8 * 3600) or equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 6800 XT (16384 MB) or GeForce RTX 2070 Super (8192 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: Sixth months have passed after Farren and Boji’s last adventure in Stray Blade. Join both in the next chapter and protect Acrea from a new enemy which threatens to take over the long-forgotten land.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
